outputs.output_descr: The Project intends to address the problems of relative poverty, social exclusion, increasing disparities and other structural problems of the Areas of Special State Concern (ASSC) and under-developed regions of Banovina and Kordun by focusing on the county, municipality and local community level. Additionally, a horizontal sub-programme will be implemented in order to address the issue of regional authorities' strategic development capacity building, the establishment of cross-sector partnerships and upgrading municipal and county development structures and institutions' absorption capacity towards national and donors' (primarily EC) funds.

This project aims to support local communities, small producers, and local authorities to prepare for the Common Agricultural Policy of the EU and to benefit from the Rural Development policies of the EU while dealing with climate changes as well. Addressing present problems, project provides support in following areas: Local Action Groups - establishment of democratic decision making structures (LAGs); support to small producers and local authorities in preparation of project technical documentation; better management of natural resources and adaptation to climate change; diversification of the economy in the form of locally-owned, innovative small businesses, closely linked to landscape and biological diversity initiatives; green Business Support Programme; the engagement of women and women's organizations

donor_name: FOND ZA OBNOVU I RAZVOJ GRADA
outputs.output_descr: The main aim of the project is to promote the economic and human development of the Vukovar community and to foster interethnic reconciliation by restoring the most symbolic secular monument of the urban historic centre: Radnički dom, or the Worker's Hall. Projec objectives were: To restore the external appearance the Worker's Hall thereby contributing to the restoration of the town's material and non-material cultural heritage; to promote inter-cultural and inter-ethnic dialogue;  to increase the city's attractiveness to tourists together with improvement of the area's potential for overall economic development.

The idea of the project is to work closely with stakeholders at the local and regional levels to identify and refine credible project ideas. These could then be further developed under the first and second components: "Preparation of Regional Development Projects" and "Preparation of Local Development Projects in Less-Developed Areas." These components offer technical and financial assistance for the preparation of project documentation, and thus can help take project ideas from the conceptual stage to a stage where they are sufficiently "mature" to be submitted for funding from EU Structural and Investment Funds.

donor_name: THE MANUFACTURER,MARKETER, AND DISTRIBUTOR OF NONALCOHOLIC BEVERAGE CONCENTRATES AND SYRUPS
outputs.output_descr: The overall goal of this Project is to contribute to the development of Gacka area as a sustainable tourism destination which bases its offer on preserved natural resources, especially water.

In targeted municipalities of Lika  Dalmatian Hinterland area:
•Key community support structures improved or established to address the needs of most vulnerable social groups
•Limited (re)construction of infrastructure carried out;
•Business development services, assistance to accessing investment capital and to public-private partnership establishment provided.

Output 1: 	Creation of the sub-regional hub for assistance to local government in the Western Balkans
Output 2: 	Assessment of the local governments' absorption / pre-accession capacities
Output 3: 	Introduction and implementation of municipal performance management
The project supports the production of policy papers, reports and other activities aimed at bringing important issues on the development agenda

project_descr: The sustainable local development programme aims at creating conditions for socio-economic recovery in war-affected areas and other underdeveloped regions, in part by supporting preparations for effective use of EU funds.
